entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is mentioned as someone who survived an attempt on his life by 'You Know Who' and has a lightning scar on his forehead.

entities.name: colin creevey
entities.description: Colin Creevey is a character in the story. He is eager to take pictures of Harry and prove that he met him.

entities.name: you know who
entities.description: You Know Who is a villain mentioned in the story as someone who tried to kill Harry.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school that Colin received a letter from and discovered he was accepted into.

entities.name: colin's dad
entities.description: Colin's dad is a milkman who couldn't believe it when Colin got accepted to Hogwarts.
